channel.title: history on TheDataAreClean
channel.description: Recent content in history on TheDataAreClean

item.title: Who's Story Is It Anyway?
item.description: __ Collation For a while, I have been working on a project to chronicle the Free and Open Source Software (FOSS) movement around the world. and specifically in India. One of the objectives is to understand the major events, stakeholders and how we reached where we did today. The entire process has been an incredible experience with so my many of my assumption broken and my views repeatedly realigned.
